candidates.title: Bump nix from 0.23.0 to 0.23.1

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
[//]: # (dependabot-start) ⚠️ **Dependabot is rebasing this PR** ⚠️ Rebasing might not happen immediately, so don't worry if this takes some time. Note: if you make any changes to this PR yourself, they will take precedence over the rebase. --- [//]: # (dependabot-end) Bumps [nix](https://github.com/nix-rust/nix) from 0.23.0 to 0.23.1.
Changelog

Sourced from nix's changelog.

[0.23.1] - 2021-12-16

Added

Changed

  • Relaxed the bitflags requirement from 1.3.1 to 1.1. This partially reverts #1492. From now on, the MSRV is not guaranteed to work with all versions of all dependencies, just with some version of all dependencies. (#1607)

Fixed

  • Fixed soundness issues in FdSet::insert, FdSet::remove, and FdSet::contains involving file descriptors outside of the range 0..FD_SETSIZE. (#1575)

Removed

Commits
  • afba7c5 (cargo-release) version 0.23.1
  • 81c0cf4 Merge #1608
  • 79ee0a5 Merge #1607
  • 178ea09 Relax the bitflags dependency from 1.3.1 to 1.1
  • cde860c [skip ci] Update cargo-release syntax in the docs
  • 5197647 Merge #1561
  • a037c33 Merge #1606
  • ac159d9 Pin the nightly compiler version used with DragonflyBSD
  • 77bc02e Update the OSX test environment for Big Sur
  • 3c52c56 Test preadv and pwritev on more operating systems
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=nix&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.23.0&new-version=0.23.1)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

candidates.title: Bump tokio from 1.6.1 to 1.15.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.6.1 to 1.15.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.15.0

Fixed

  • io: add cooperative yielding support to io::empty() (#4300)
  • time: make timeout robust against budget-depleting tasks (#4314)

Changed

  • update minimum supported Rust version to 1.46.

Added

  • time: add Interval::reset() (#4248)
  • io: add explicit lifetimes to AsyncFdReadyGuard (#4267)
  • process: add Command::as_std() (#4295)

Added (unstable)

  • tracing: instrument tokio::sync types (#4302)

#4302: tokio-rs/tokio#4302 #4300: tokio-rs/tokio#4300 #4295: tokio-rs/tokio#4295 #4267: tokio-rs/tokio#4267 #4248: tokio-rs/tokio#4248 #4314: tokio-rs/tokio#4314

Tokio v1.14.0

1.14.0 (November 15, 2021)

Fixed

  • macros: fix compiler errors when using mut patterns in select! (#4211)
  • sync: fix a data race between oneshot::Sender::send and awaiting a oneshot::Receiver when the oneshot has been closed (#4226)
  • sync: make AtomicWaker panic safe (#3689)
  • runtime: fix basic scheduler dropping tasks outside a runtime context (#4213)

Added

  • stats: add RuntimeStats::busy_duration_total (#4179, #4223)

Changed

  • io: updated copy buffer size to match std::io::copy (#4209)

Documented

  • io: rename buffer to file in doc-test (#4230)

... (truncated)

Commits
  • f646735 chore: prepare Tokio v1.15.0 release (#4320)
  • 54e6693 time: make timeout robust against budget-depleting tasks (#4314)
  • 4e3268d tracing: instrument more resources (#4302)
  • 4b6bb1d chore(util): start v0.7 release cycle (#4313)
  • eb1af7f io: make tokio::io::empty cooperative (#4300)
  • 0bc9160 chore: update labeler.yml to drop filepath prefixes (#4308)
  • 4c571b5 runtime: fix typo in the task modules (#4306)
  • 60ba634 time: fix typo in tokio-time document (#4304)
  • f73ed1f runtime: fix typo (#4303)
  • ee4b2ed process: add as_std() method to Command (#4295)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=tokio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.6.1&new-version=1.15.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

candidates.title: Bump libc from 0.2.103 to 0.2.112

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [libc](https://github.com/rust-lang/libc) from 0.2.103 to 0.2.112.
Release notes

Sourced from libc's releases.

0.2.108

What's Changed

  • Add TIOCM_* constants for Illumos and Solaris. by @​de-vri-es in rust-lang/libc#2521
  • linux: Add open_how and related flags by @​Fanael in rust-lang/libc#2477
  • netbsd add uucred struct by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2523
  • openbsd backtrace api addition by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2527
  • freebsd sem api addition by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2526
  • Scope in Send, Sync for wasi by @​workingjubilee in rust-lang/libc#2528
  • linux/android ctermid addition. by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2532
  • Move more ioctl constants and flags to linux::arch::* modules. by @​de-vri-es in rust-lang/libc#2530
  • windows add printf/fprintf by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2533
  • Add more FreeBSD consts by @​GuillaumeGomez in rust-lang/libc#2536
  • haiku dl_phdr_iterate addition (supports since beta3). by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2534
  • freebsd add vmtotal sysctl query by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2529
  • Suggest the mach2 crate instead by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2539
  • Ignore TIOCREMOTE on macOS by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2544
  • netbsd/openbsd ftok addition. by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2542
  • Add base definitions for riscv64 + musl by @​kanavin in rust-lang/libc#2537
  • Add FreeBSD 14 CI by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2545
  • Use libc specific type for architecture specific ioctl defines on Linux. by @​de-vri-es in rust-lang/libc#2550
  • netbsd add sysctldesc query. by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2551
  • Add documentation for kinfo_proc fields by @​GuillaumeGomez in rust-lang/libc#2552
  • couple of ptrace query for openbsd by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2553
  • Add more items for FreeBSD by @​GuillaumeGomez in rust-lang/libc#2549
  • Upgrade crate version to 0.2.108 by @​GuillaumeGomez in rust-lang/libc#2541

New Contributors

  • @​Fanael made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2477
  • @​kanavin made their first contribution in rust-lang/libc#2537

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rust-lang/libc/compare/0.2.107...0.2.108

0.2.107

What's Changed

  • Release 0.2.106 to incorporate build fix for #2484 by @​joshtriplett in rust-lang/libc#2494
  • solarish sendfilev fn flavor by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2497
  • Skip CI on sparc64-unknown-linux-gnu for now by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2503
  • DragonFly's devname_r takes a size_t len parameter by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2489
  • Declare clock_settime for macOS. by @​DimitrisJim in rust-lang/libc#2496
  • fix cmsg test proposal by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2501
  • sparc64: Update debian image to 11 (2021-10-20) to fix segfault on CI by @​JohnTitor in rust-lang/libc#2504
  • netbsd/openbsd add AI_* constants by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2495
  • Enable clock_gettime on wasi by @​coolreader18 in rust-lang/libc#2499
  • Use link modifiers -bundle on musl and wasi target by @​12101111 in rust-lang/libc#2272
  • Add getresgid and getresuid to DragonFly, FreeBSD and OpenBSD by @​rtzoeller in rust-lang/libc#2505
  • add SO_*_FILTER for Android by @​hhyhhy in rust-lang/libc#2506
  • haiku: add missing ifaddrs definitions by @​jessicah in rust-lang/libc#2510
  • Add procctl data constants on freebsd by @​niluxv in rust-lang/libc#2511
  • netbsd libutil update by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2512
  • win32 remove deprecated winapi part by @​devnexen in rust-lang/libc#2513

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 55c44a2 Auto merge of #2590 - GuillaumeGomez:private-fields, r=Amanieu
  • a11e45e Auto merge of #2591 - semarie:openbsd-archs, r=Amanieu
  • 56234f6 correct arm c_long size
  • f328dd7 add more archs definition for openbsd: arm, mips64, powerpc, powerpc64, riscv64
  • 62e20fd Upgrade crate version to 0.2.112
  • 4b0433d Make some private struct fields public
  • 18bfd17 Auto merge of #2589 - devnexen:sockcred2_fbsd_fix_proposal, r=Amanieu
  • da089ce freebsd proposal to move sockcred2 usage in the root mod while ignoring it fo...
  • f42fe9a Auto merge of #2588 - GuillaumeGomez:upgrade, r=Amanieu
  • 9b054d8 Auto merge of #2587 - rtzoeller:dfly_fallocate_fadvise, r=Amanieu
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=libc&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.2.103&new-version=0.2.112)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. candidates.title: Bump nix from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [nix](https://github.com/nix-rust/nix) from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0.
Changelog

Sourced from nix's changelog.

[0.23.0] - 2021-09-28

Added

  • Added the LocalPeerCred sockopt. (#1482)
  • Added TimeSpec::from_duration and TimeSpec::from_timespec (#1465)
  • Added IPV6_V6ONLY sockopt. (#1470)
  • Added impl From<User> for libc::passwd trait implementation to convert a User into a libc::passwd. Consumes the User struct to give ownership over the member pointers. (#1471)
  • Added pthread_kill. (#1472)
  • Added mknodat. (#1473)
  • Added setrlimit and getrlimit. (#1302)
  • Added ptrace::interrupt method for platforms that support PTRACE_INTERRUPT (#1422)
  • Added IP6T_SO_ORIGINAL_DST sockopt. (#1490)
  • Added the PTRACE_EVENT_STOP variant to the sys::ptrace::Event enum (#1335)
  • Exposed SockAddr::from_raw_sockaddr (#1447)
  • Added TcpRepair (#1503)
  • Enabled pwritev and preadv for more operating systems. (#1511)
  • Added support for TCP_MAXSEG TCP Maximum Segment Size socket options (#1292)
  • Added Ipv4RecvErr and Ipv6RecvErr sockopts and associated control messages. (#1514)
  • Added AsRawFd implementation on PollFd. (#1516)
  • Added Ipv4Ttl and Ipv6Ttl sockopts. (#1515)
  • Added MAP_EXCL, MAP_ALIGNED_SUPER, and MAP_CONCEAL mmap flags, and exposed MAP_ANONYMOUS for all operating systems. (#1522) (#1525) (#1531) (#1534)
  • Added read/write accessors for 'events' on PollFd. (#1517)

Changed

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 50b4865 (cargo-release) version 0.23.0
  • 1b5476a [skip ci] Change release procedure to use cargo-release
  • 150579c Merge #1538 #1545 #1546
  • a607034 Fix return value of posix_fadvise
  • 8d6c2b3 Revert "Expose SockAddr::from_raw_sockaddr"
  • 1671edc Fix memory unsafety in unistd::getgrouplist
  • 759b34a Merge #1536
  • af01302 Merge pull request #1543 from asomers/CHANGELOG-0.23.0
  • 24803c5 [skip ci] tweak CHANGELOG formatting
  • 389185e Lower limits in setrlimit example
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=nix&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.22.0&new-version=0.23.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

candidates.title: Bump env_logger from 0.8.3 to 0.9.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [env_logger](https://github.com/env-logger-rs/env_logger) from 0.8.3 to 0.9.0.
Release notes

Sourced from env_logger's releases.

v0.9.0

Breaking Changes:

  • Default message format now prints the target instead of the module

Improvements:

  • Added a method to print the module instead of the target

0.8.4

Improvements:

  • Allow writing logs to a custom output target (via Target::Pipe)

Bug fixes:

  • Actually allow overriding filter levels using env_logger::Builders methods, as documented
Commits
  • 04856ac bump version to 0.9.0
  • e4744ff Merge pull request #209 from gtsiam/main
  • c5fa7a2 refactor: fix clippy warnings
  • 34574df Update link to examples
  • 1888497 Clarified documentation about log filtering
  • 365ffaf Show target instead of module path by default
  • d2998a6 Add option to print log target
  • 13cafce Bump version to 0.8.4
  • 0900811 Ensure unique directive names when building filters
  • 1a8379a Allow writing logs to a custom output target (Target::Pipe)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

candidates.title: Bump nix from 0.21.0 to 0.22.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

candidates.body:
Bumps [nix](https://github.com/nix-rust/nix) from 0.21.0 to 0.22.0.
Changelog

Sourced from nix's changelog.

[0.22.0] - 9 July 2021

Added

  • Added if_nameindex (#1445)
  • Added nmount for FreeBSD. (#1453)
  • Added IpFreebind socket option (sockopt) on Linux, Fuchsia and Android. (#1456)
  • Added TcpUserTimeout socket option (sockopt) on Linux and Fuchsia. (#1457)
  • Added renameat2 for Linux (#1458)
  • Added RxqOvfl support on Linux, Fuchsia and Android. (#1455)

Changed

  • ptsname_r now returns a lossily-converted string in the event of bad UTF, just like ptsname. (#1446)
  • Nix's error type is now a simple wrapper around the platform's Errno. This means it is now Into<std::io::Error>. It's also Clone, Copy, Eq, and has a small fixed size. It also requires less typing. For example, the old enum variant nix::Error::Sys(nix::errno::Errno::EINVAL) is now simply nix::Error::EINVAL. (#1446)

Fixed

Removed

Commits
  • See full diff in compare view

chosen_pr.title: Bump tokio from 1.6.1 to 1.15.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

chosen_pr.body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.6.1 to 1.15.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.15.0

Fixed

  • io: add cooperative yielding support to io::empty() (#4300)
  • time: make timeout robust against budget-depleting tasks (#4314)

Changed

  • update minimum supported Rust version to 1.46.

Added

  • time: add Interval::reset() (#4248)
  • io: add explicit lifetimes to AsyncFdReadyGuard (#4267)
  • process: add Command::as_std() (#4295)

Added (unstable)

  • tracing: instrument tokio::sync types (#4302)

#4302: tokio-rs/tokio#4302 #4300: tokio-rs/tokio#4300 #4295: tokio-rs/tokio#4295 #4267: tokio-rs/tokio#4267 #4248: tokio-rs/tokio#4248 #4314: tokio-rs/tokio#4314

Tokio v1.14.0

1.14.0 (November 15, 2021)

Fixed

  • macros: fix compiler errors when using mut patterns in select! (#4211)
  • sync: fix a data race between oneshot::Sender::send and awaiting a oneshot::Receiver when the oneshot has been closed (#4226)
  • sync: make AtomicWaker panic safe (#3689)
  • runtime: fix basic scheduler dropping tasks outside a runtime context (#4213)

Added

  • stats: add RuntimeStats::busy_duration_total (#4179, #4223)

Changed

  • io: updated copy buffer size to match std::io::copy (#4209)

Documented

  • io: rename buffer to file in doc-test (#4230)

... (truncated)

Commits
  • f646735 chore: prepare Tokio v1.15.0 release (#4320)
  • 54e6693 time: make timeout robust against budget-depleting tasks (#4314)
  • 4e3268d tracing: instrument more resources (#4302)
  • 4b6bb1d chore(util): start v0.7 release cycle (#4313)
  • eb1af7f io: make tokio::io::empty cooperative (#4300)
  • 0bc9160 chore: update labeler.yml to drop filepath prefixes (#4308)
  • 4c571b5 runtime: fix typo in the task modules (#4306)
  • 60ba634 time: fix typo in tokio-time document (#4304)
  • f73ed1f runtime: fix typo (#4303)
  • ee4b2ed process: add as_std() method to Command (#4295)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=tokio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.6.1&new-version=1.15.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

chosen_detail.title: Bump tokio from 1.6.1 to 1.15.0

repo.name: socksns
repo.description: A tool for running an application in an isolated network namespace, with external network access only through a SOCKS proxy.
